alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 9:46AM MST until February 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches in the mountains, with less than 1 inch at lower elevations. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph through this afternoon. * WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
